text: Swimming at the 2015 World Aquatics Championships was held between 2 and 9 August 2015 in Kazan, Russia.Info at FINA.org The United States won the overall medal count, led by Katie Ledecky who claimed five gold medals. ==Schedule== 42 events were held.Schedule All time are local (UTC+3). {| class="wikitable" style="margin:0.5em auto; font-size:90%;position:relative;" width=25%; |- |bgcolor="#6be4f2" align=center|H||Heats |bgcolor="#95d6f7" align=center|½||Semifinals |bgcolor="#5ea2f7" align=center|F||Final |- |} M = Morning session (starting at 09:30), E = Evening session (starting at 17:30) {| class="wikitable" style="margin:0.5em auto; font-size:95%; line- height:1.25em;" |+Men |- style="text-align:center;" !
